urga TinyMCE Skin for advanced theme
by Dries Desmet

based on the work done by by Mark Eagleton thebigreason.com
Version 0.1 - Released 11/1/2013

To Install

	1. Place urga folder in /tiny_mce/themes/advanced/skins/

	2. Add the following line to the tinyMCE.init() function call in your form:
	
		skin : "urga"
		
		-- example in context ----------------
		
			tinyMCE.init({
				...
				theme : "advanced",
				skin : "urga"
			});
			
		-- jQuery example --------------------
		
		$('textarea.mceEditor').tinymce({
			...
			theme : "advanced",
			skin : "urga"
		
		});

	3. Refresh your form page.
	
For more information on form configuration, consult the TinyMCE Wiki

	http://wiki.moxiecode.com/index.php/TinyMCE:Configuration
	
This TinyMCE theme makes use of the fabulous famfamfam silk icons set by Mark James
